definition.featurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="feature_container" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><value name="feature"><block type="feature_disk"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="1"></mutation><field name="half_height">2</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This block represents a disk of sand.</comment><value name="target"><block type="block_predicate_matching_blocks"><field name="x">0</field><field name="y">0</field><field name="z">0</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">The disk can only replace grass and dirt</comment><value name="blockSet"><block type="block_holderset_list" inline="true"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="1"></mutation><field name="block0">Blocks.STONE#0</field></block></value></block></value><value name="radius"><block type="int_provider_uniform"><field name="min">0</field><field name="max">0</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">The disk has a radius between 2 and 6.</comment></block></value><value name="fallback"><block type="blockstate_selector"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="0"></mutation><field name="block">CUSTOM:Microbialmatt</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This is the default block used for the disk.</comment></block></value><value name="rule0"><block type="disk_rule" inline="false"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">Place sandstone instead of sand if the block below it is air.</comment><value name="if_true"><block type="block_predicate_matching_blocks"><field name="x">0</field><field name="y">-1</field><field name="z">0</field><value name="blockSet"><block type="block_holderset_list" inline="true"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="1"></mutation><field name="block0">Blocks.AIR</field></block></value></block></value><value name="then"><block type="blockstate_selector"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" inputs="0"></mutation><field name="block">CUSTOM:Microbialmatt</field></block></value></block></value></block></value><next><block type="placement_count"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">Each chunk will try to generate 3 disks of sand</comment><value name="count"><block type="int_provider_constant"><field name="value">4</field></block></value><next><block type="placement_height_triangular"><value name="min"><block type="vertical_anchor_absolute"><field name="value">30</field></block></value><value name="max"><block type="vertical_anchor_absolute"><field name="value">67</field></block></value><next><block type="placement_in_square"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This moves the feature so that it doesn't generate in the corner only</comment><next><block type="placement_heightmap"><field name="heightmap">OCEAN_FLOOR_WG</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">We try to generate the feature on the ocean floor</comment><next><block type="placement_biome_filter"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">Prevents the feature from generating in other biomes</comment></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
